DESCRIPTION: providing the library with new chairs, tables and computer stations
installing 13 little free libraries across town.

ITEM_NAME: Computers for the community learning center
DESCRIPTION: funding 20 laptops including mice and keyboards, giving students a place to study.

ITEM_NAME: Interactive Technology for the Main Library
DESCRIPTION: This project will fund an iPad lending kiosk and 16 iPads, as well as a permanent interactive screen in the Children’s Room of the Main Library.

ITEM_NAME: Digital Sign at City Hall in Multiple Languages
DESCRIPTION: Digital sign that will scroll announcements in multiple languages and welcome people to town.

ITEM_NAME: Enhancements to the Central Square Library
DESCRIPTION: Update the Central Square library and expand the variety of items for loan. Proposed enhancements are new furniture, a laptop kiosk, and fun, non-traditional items for loan. These improvements would benefit the neighborhood and community.
Renovate a space in a Cambridge Public School and install washers and dryers for students who do not have easy access to laundry services at home, to use for their clothing and necessities.
Upgrades will allow for the latest in technology be available for public use in the meeting room.
A kitchen renovation, including installation of new cabinetry, sink, stove/hot plate, and kitchen equipment.
Add automatic sliding doors, fix driveway and, if needed, remove steps to benefit seniors and people with disabilities.
install 8 bike repair stations with tools and bike pumps across the city for cyclists to quickly, easily, and freely fix routine bike problems.
Improve safety for drivers and bikers by moving bike lanes to be between street parking spots and the sidewalk, reducing car-bike interactions and potential collisions.

ITEM_NAME: Real-Time Bus Arrival Monitors in bus stations
DESCRIPTION: Real-time bus arrival monitors bus stops will inform travelers when the next bus will arrive, so they can adjust their plans if needed.
Install 12 benches across town so that people of all ages and abilities can enjoy benches for resting, talking, tinkering with electronic devices, people watching, and being outdoors.

Bicycle owners need to clean and care for their bikes, ideally monthly. But for apartment dwellers, this is really hard! These centrally located bicycle wash stations would allow bicycle owners to wash off dirt, grime, and salt from their bikes.

ITEM_NAME: Sheltered Bike Parking at the Main Library
DESCRIPTION: The Main Library needs more bicycle parking. A glass pavilion, protecting bikes from the weather, landscaped with paths and trees, will be an attractive and functional addition to the library grounds.
Remind drivers to slow down by deploying live speed displays on busiest streets.
Navigating intersections can be confusing. Adding bike signals to busy intersections will help cyclists safely navigate intersections and make the roads more predictable and friendly for all.
To enhance pedestrian safety, this project will add a minimum of five new crosswalks to major streets.

Speed humps create a safer environment by helping slow traffic on streets that students and families cross frequently. When a car hits a pedestrian at a high rate of speed, the collision is more likely to result in a pedestrian fatality. Speed humps slow vehicles and give drivers increased response time and distance for stopping. This makes streets safer for pedestrians.
Street trees cool the city, absorb pollution, & make our neighborhoods more livable! planting 100 new trees & building tree wells in the areas that need them most.
24-hour access public toilet near Central Square.
At a water bottle refill station you get a healthy drink for free.

Let’s feed the hungry in our city. A freezer van is the vital piece of equipment that would allow to potentially double prepared food rescue deliveries from roughly 3,500 healthy frozen meals to 7,000 each week.
install energy conversion devices on gym equipment and a rapid electric vehicle charging station.

ITEM_NAME: Nursing Pod for Mothers and Infants
DESCRIPTION: Provide an attractive private space where working mothers and community members can breastfeed or pump during the work day.

ITEM_NAME: Critical Resource Kits for the Homeless
DESCRIPTION: Deliver resource kits to homeless residents through established programs. These kits will provide supplies such as socks, feminine hygiene products, toiletries, first aid kits, and other items to most vulnerable population.

This project would fund rapid flashing beacons at 10 high pedestrian risk crosswalks. These beacons increase the visibility of pedestrians, especially at night. They can alert drivers to crossing pedestrians, thereby preventing crashes.

ITEM_NAME: Smarter Cleanup for a Smart Cityources.
DESCRIPTION: A cleaner, by way of hands-free, solar-powered BigBelly bins. The new, foot-pedal operated trash and recycling compactors can provide free local WiFi, cut carbon emissions, and conserve City resources.
Free, clean, renewable energy! Let’s add solar panels to the Youth Center to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and save money on energy.

Install high-visibility markers on fire hydrants around town to increase safety for all residents and reduce response time of the fire department by improving ease of locating hydrants in emergencies, at night, and in the snow.

ITEM_NAME: Free Wifi in 6 Outdoor Public Spaces
DESCRIPTION: Install special outdoor wifi access points to offer free public wifi in the public space.

ITEM_NAME: Outdoor Fitness Equipment in the public park
DESCRIPTION: Install outdoor body-weight fitness equipment for stretching, strength building, and plyometric exercises.
building a dog park.

ITEM_NAME: Building an amphitheater in the public park
DESCRIPTION: Build an amphitheater in the public park for outdoor performances, music, stories, and other cultural events that the whole community can enjoy.

ITEM_NAME: Volleyball Court in the public park
DESCRIPTION: Creating an outdoor volleyball court would be an exciting addition to the city. The court would have sand and a sturdy net for three-season usage.
This Universal Design playground would include equipment that is designed to be usable by everyone without special adaptations or retrofitting.

ITEM_NAME: Remodel the Kitchen at the Youth Cente
DESCRIPTION: The kitchen area in the Youth Center is in dire need of renovating. Replace the stove, dishwasher, cabinets, and countertops in the Frisoli Youth Center kitchen.

ITEM_NAME: Shade and Wet Weather Canopies for Playgrounds
DESCRIPTION: Installing canopies over playgrounds that do not have protection from the elements will reduce weather-related safety concerns and increase playground availability and use.

ITEM_NAME: Let’s Rest: Picnic Tables & Benches for Our Parks
DESCRIPTION: Benches and picnic tables bring our community together. Installing new benches and picnic tables in up to 10 of our park will allow people of all ages and abilities to enjoy them for resting, talking, reading, people watching and being outdoors.

ITEM_NAME: Protect the Health and Safety of our Firefighters
DESCRIPTION: This proposal will purchase and install six gear drying units to shorten wait time for clean gear ($51,000), and eleven sets of wireless headsets to protect hearing and improve communication ($55,000). Let’s protect those who protect us.
New Chairs for Public Schools
Install music studios and equipment at the Youth Centers to inspire creativity, enable pre-teens and teens to express their skills and passions, and provide youth with another recreational outlet.

Leverage local artists to develop an educational campaign about proper disposal of recyclables, trash and compost. This approach will decrease waste, reduce recycling/compost contamination and reduce rats by improving sanitation.

ITEM_NAME: Installing Lights at the school Basketball Court
DESCRIPTION: Install lighting to extend safe playing hours for basketball courts. Increases safety for community members while expanding healthy alternatives for youth and access to public space.
Field construction, synthetic turf, goal posts & installation for 25’x70’ soccer field on east side of school.

ITEM_NAME: Upgraded Water Fountains for Public Schools
DESCRIPTION: Project would install 35 new water bottle refilling fountains in public schools.
Purchasing laptop carts for ten public schools.
Upgrades to four bathrooms in elementary schools.
Playground should include a jungle gym, and other equipment for kids to play different games.
install security cameras in public schools.
